sqlList.sql: select t.fog_order_num,t.hotel_name,TO_CHAR(t.in_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS INDATE,t.contact_name,t.ticket_usercode,t.ticket_amount,t.book_total_price, t.login_mobile,tlu.can_applictaion_amount,tlu.audit_amount,tlu.pulling_amount,t.FOG_AUDITSTATUS,'' AS CashTaskStatus, '' AS CashSN from t_lm_order t left join t_lm_cash_user tlu on t.login_mobile=tlu.user_id where t.fog_order_num=:ORDERNO
select tlu.can_applictaion_amount,tlu.audit_amount,tlu.pulling_amount from t_lm_cash_user tlu where tlu.user_id=:USERID
select :CashSN AS CashSN, status from t_lm_cash where SN=:CashSN

update t_lm_cash set bank_name = :BANKNAME, bank_branch = :BANKBRANCH, bank_card_number = :BANKCARDNUMBER, bank_card_owner = :BANKCARDOWNER, alipay_account = :ALIPAYACCOUNT, recharge_phone_number = :PHONENUMBER, process_remark=:REMARK, apply_type=:APPLYTYPE, SOURCE_CHANNEL='CMS', ALIPAY_ACCOUNT_NAME=:USERNAME where sn = :SN
update T_LM_CASH_HIS set TYPE='2' where sn = :SN
update t_lm_cash set ALIPAY_ACCOUNT_NAME = :ALIPAYACCOUNTNAME where SN= :SN
